titles.title: Be still and know that I am God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Be still and know that I am God
(repeat 3x)
Psalm 46:10

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I am the Lord that healeth thee (repeat 3x)
Isaiah 57:18,19

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
In Thee O Lord I put my trust (repeat 3x)
Isaiah 30:15
